SELECT qiuzu.* ,detaileaddress.* , IFNULL(area.`name`,'')trading, IFNULL(fcode.name,'')district, ifnull(`profile`.avatar,'-1')avatar from ( SELECT qiuzu.qiuzuid , ifnull(metro.metroid,'-1')metroid , ifnull(metro.code,'-1')citycode , qiuzu.user_id , qiuzu.detailid, qiuzu.`code` , qiuzu.qiuzustatus , ifnull(metro.`name` ,'-1')metroname, ifnull(metro.finalstop , '-1')finalstop, qiuzu.update_time create_time, ifnull(qiuzu.classification,'-1')classification , qiuzu.housetype , ifnull(qiuzu.price,'0')price from qiuzu LEFT JOIN metro on qiuzu.metroid = metro.metroid where 1=1 and qiuzu.user_id > 1 AND qiuzu.qiuzustatus != '0'
AND qiuzu.qiuzuid > #{pagequery.pagestart} and qiuzu.qiuzuid<=#{pagequery.pageend} ) qiuzu LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on qiuzu.detailid = detaileaddress.detailid LEFT JOIN `user` on qiuzu.user_id = `user`.userid LEFT JOIN `profile` on `profile`.user_id = `user`.userid left join area ON qiuzu.`code` = area.`code` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from area) fcode on area.parentId = fcode.code

select count(1) from qiuzu left join area ON qiuzu.`code` = area.`code` LEFT join user on qiuzu.user_id=user.userid left join profile on user.userid=profile.user_id
INNER JOIN detaileaddress ON detaileaddress.detailid = building.detailid
where qiuzu.qiuzustatus = '1'

select qiuzu.* ,area.`name` district ,ifnull(metro.`name`,'') metroname ,ifnull(metro.finalstop,'')finalstop, detaileaddress.* from qiuzu left join area on area.`code` = qiuzu.`code` LEFT JOIN metro on metro.metroid = qiuzu.metroid LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on detaileaddress.detailid = qiuzu.detailid where user_id= #{userid} and qiuzustatus != '0' order by qiuzu.update_time desc
limit #{pagequery.pagestart} , 8

select count(1) from qiuzu left join area on area.`code` = qiuzu.`code` LEFT JOIN metro on metro.metroid = qiuzu.metroid LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on detaileaddress.detailid = qiuzu.detailid where user_id= #{userid} and qiuzustatus != '0'

select buy.* ,area.`name` district ,ifnull(metro.`name`,'') metroname ,ifnull(metro.finalstop,'')finalstop, detaileaddress.* from buy left join area on area.`code` = buy.`code` LEFT JOIN metro on metro.metroid = buy.metroid LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on detaileaddress.detailid = buy.detailid where user_id= #{userid} and buy.buystatus != '0' order by buy.update_time desc

and qiuzu.`code` like CONCAT('',#{code},'%')
GROUP BY qiuzu.user_id )b on b.user_id = qiuzu.user_id
where qiuzu.`code` like CONCAT('',#{code},'%')
GROUP BY qiuzu.user_id

select IFNULL(COUNT(1),'0')count from qiuzu where update_time >= DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE() , INTERVAL 3 MONTH ) and qiuzu.user_id = #{user_id} and qiuzu.`code` LIKE CONCAT('',#{code},'%') and phone =#{phone}

SELECT qiuzu.qiuzuid , ifnull(metro.metroid ,'')metroid,qiuzu.user_id ,qiuzu.`code` ,ifnull(qiuzu.housetype,'-1')housetype, ifnull(metro.`name` ,'') metroname, ifnull(metro.finalstop,'')finalstop,qiuzu.update_time create_time, ifnull(qiuzu.classification,'') classification,qiuzu.housetype , ifnull(qiuzu.price ,'')price , IFNULL(area.`name`,'')trading, IFNULL( metro.`code` ,1) citycode, IFNULL(fcode.name,'')district , ifnull(`profile`.avatar,'')avatar, ifnull(`profile`.user_name ,'')user_name, IFNULL(detaileaddress.detailes,'')detailes from qiuzu LEFT JOIN metro on qiuzu.metroid = metro.metroid LEFT JOIN `user` on qiuzu.user_id = `user`.userid LEFT JOIN `profile` on `profile`.user_id = `user`.userid left join area ON qiuzu.`code` = area.`code` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from area) fcode on area.parentId = fcode.code LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on qiuzu.detailid = detaileaddress.detailid where qiuzu.qiuzuid = #{qiuzuid}

SELECT qiuzu.qiuzuid , ifnull(metro.metroid ,'-1')metroid,qiuzu.user_id ,qiuzu.`code` ,ifnull(qiuzu.housetype,'-1')housetype, ifnull(metro.`name` ,'-1') metroname, ifnull(metro.finalstop,'-1')finalstop,qiuzu.update_time create_time, ifnull(qiuzu.classification,'-1') classification,qiuzu.housetype , ifnull(qiuzu.price ,'-1')price , IFNULL(area.`name`,'')trading, IFNULL(fcode.name,'')district , ifnull(`profile`.avatar,'-1')avatar from qiuzu LEFT JOIN metro on qiuzu.metroid = metro.metroid LEFT JOIN `user` on qiuzu.user_id = `user`.userid LEFT JOIN `profile` on `profile`.user_id = `user`.userid left join area ON qiuzu.`code` = area.`code` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from area) fcode on area.parentId = fcode.code where qiuzu.user_id = #{user_id}

select buy.* ,area.`name` district ,ifnull(metro.`name`,'') metroname , ifnull(metro.finalstop,'')finalstop, detaileaddress.* from buy left join area on area.`code` = buy.`code` LEFT JOIN metro on metro.metroid = buy.metroid LEFT JOIN detaileaddress on detaileaddress.detailid = buy.detailid where buy.buyid = #{buyid}
